mapper.insert: insert into RoutineBoard (user_email, routine_brd_title, routine_brd_content, routine_brd_regdate, routine_brd_hit, routine_cart_seq, brd_image1, brd_image2, brd_rec) values (#{user_email}, #{routine_brd_title}, #{routine_brd_content}, now(), 0, #{routine_cart_seq}, #{brd_image1}, #{brd_image2}, 0)
mapper.update: update RoutineBoard set routine_brd_title=#{routine_brd_title}, routine_brd_content=#{routine_brd_content}, routine_cart_seq=#{routine_cart_seq}, brd_image1=#{brd_image1}, brd_image2=#{brd_image2} where routine_brd_seq=#{routine_brd_seq}
mapper.insert: insert into RoutineBoardComment (routine_brd_seq, user_email, user_nickname, routine_cmt,routine_cmt_date,routine_cmt_ref,routine_cmt_depth,routine_cmt_step) values (#{routine_brd_seq},#{user_email},#{user_nickname},#{routine_cmt},now(),0,0,0)

Select MAX(routine_cmt_step)+1 from RoutineBoardComment rbc_sub where routine_cmt_ref = #{routine_cmt_ref} and routine_brd_seq = #{routine_brd_seq}
insert into RoutineBoardComment (routine_brd_seq, user_email, user_nickname, routine_cmt,routine_cmt_date,routine_cmt_ref,routine_cmt_depth,routine_cmt_step) values (#{routine_brd_seq},#{user_email},#{user_nickname},#{routine_cmt},now(),#{routine_cmt_ref},1,#{routine_cmt_step})
mapper.select: select * from RoutineBoardComment where routine_brd_seq = #{routine_brd_seq} ORDER BY routine_cmt_ref DESC , routine_cmt_step ASC
